comments: Not multiplicative: a(3)*a(7) <> a(21), for example. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 20 2011
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A050461 := proc(n)        a := 0 ;        for d in numtheory[divisors](n) do                if (n/d) mod 4 = 1 then                        a := a+d^2 ;                end if;        end do:        a;end proc:seq(A050461(n),n=1..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 20 2011
prog: (Haskell)a050461 n = sum [d ^ 2 | d <- a027750_row n, mod (div n d) 4 == 1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 06 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 1999
